column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday April 12 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD BETWEEN HARRODSBURG RD AND NICHOLASVILLE RD:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown until further notice due to investigation of an earlier serious collision.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD BETWEEN HARRODSBURG RD AND NICHOLASVILLE RD:
